item.title: TLDR: Bite Sized Article Takeaways
item.description: Guzey’s Productivity System Link to article If you’ve been procrastinating for most of the day: Accept that you won’t do anything today, and don’t get angry at yourself Set an alarm for when you’ll prep for bed Procrastinate for the rest of the day When the alarm rings pack your laptop and everything else you need for work in your backpack When you wake up leave the house immediately with your backpack Go to a library, caffe, or other place to GSD Return home in the evening Context intentionality as the difference home and every other place on earth
